name: crystal cluster sterling silver ring
description:
hand sculpted ring with prism cluster center piece
made of solid sterling silver 
available in  ring sizes 6, 7, and 8
depending on size requested there could be a 3 week lead-time.
if time is an issue and you want to inquire about the availability of a particular size, feel free to email us.

name: Sterling Silver Ring with Crystal
description:
Sterling silver crystal rings of black onyx, amethyst, rose quartz, or crystal quartz bring with them their own specific strengths and remedies while radiating their unique energies.

depending on size requested there could be a 3 week lead-time.
if time is an issue and you want to inquire about the availability of a particular size, feel free to email us.

See our sizing page for a printable fit page if you are uncertain of your ring size. 

note: sizes 6, 7, and 8 are the most common/average ring sizes.



(designed 2008)

name: Sterling Silver Antiqued Memento-Mori Locket
description:
This piece is part of our memory series and plays with ways to hold onto memory and keep loved ones close. 

Inspired by Victorian mourning lockets, each hand-crafted sterling silver locket holds a miniature diorama, such as pressed flowers, stitched locks of hair, or dried lady bugs. Each locket also contains a tiny tea stained simple phrase. The locket is composed of two parts, the locket itself and the interior diorama casing that is closed off with a crystal plane of glass. 

Here the lockets read “in dreams we play”, “I think of you”, “my love” and “just like heaven”. The lady bug version is available (lady bugs are said to be lucky), but we can also mount custom items or phrases for you. (Phrases can read up to 17 characters long including spaces). Some ideas are: locks of hair to keep a loved one close, eyelashes for wishes, a clipping of a sentimental piece of lace or fabric, sand or soil from a place you hold dear in your heart, a beloved pet's whisker, or even a chunk of someone significant's familiar old sweater.

If you would like a custom phrase or would like a personal memento put in a locket for you, and have questions on limitations, please contact us by email. When purchasing,  select 'custom' on the drop down box and note your phrase in the paypal 'notes to seller' box. Space is limited for the number of characters used in the phrase, but we have many suggestions depending on the memento you are using or the situation at hand. 

If you are crafty and enjoy doing things yourself, or of you are hesitant to send off something of meaning through the post, creating your own diorama within the locket at home is also an option and we provide directions with each locket purchased on how you can do this yourself.

Each locket is approximately 5/8" in diameter. The interior diorama casing is approximately 1/2" in diameter and 1/8" deep. Each locket comes on a 30" sterling silver simple cable chain.

(designed 2010)

options.name: Antiqued Sterling Silver Locket 'my love' lady bug
Antiqued Sterling Silver Locket 'i think of you' lady bug
Antiqued Sterling Silver Locket-'in dreams we play'
Antique Silver Locket 'in all ways mystified'' lady bug
Antique Silver Locket-'so that I might wish'

name: Bronze Monster Pencil Topper
description:
We referenced a vintage rubber pencil topper of one of our favorite old Japanese monsters! Now he is immortalized in bronze. This little guy is scary in two ways, you can flip him over to experience his second scary face.

This topper fits standard pencils and most BIC style pens.

Approximately 1" x 1" x 1"

Fun and scary!

name: Embroidered Tassel Scapular Pendant, Diamond Pattern
description:
Each of these embroidered patch pendants is made by hand, and is embellished with tassels. Inspired by traditional scapulars, each patch carries with it a phrase on the back side. Each pendant comes on a waxed cotton adjustable cord (slip knot slides to size).

This particular diamond image is meant to act as an eye to ward off evil.

The patterns on all of our scapulars have been influenced by American quilts from the deep south, as well as east coast scrimshaw artifacts. Texts are self created as well as borrowed from famous songs and scrimshaw carved phrases that would have been created by love-sick sailors. 

Text to choose from for this diamond eye image:

Option 1: 
BELIEVE ME TRUE, ALL DAY LONG I DREAM OF YOU

Option 2: 
JUST AS THIS YOU NOW SEE - MY LOVE ALWAYS REMEMBER ME

options.name: JUST AS THIS YOU KNOW SEE MY LOVE ALWAYS REMEMBER ME
BELIEVE ME TRUE ALL DAY LONG I DREAM OF YOU

name: Embroidered Tassel Scapular Pendant, Triangles Pattern
description:
Each of these embroidered patch pendants is made by hand, and is embellished with tassels. Inspired by traditional scapulars, each patch carries with it a phrase on the back side. Each pendant comes on a waxed cotton adjustable cord (slip knot slides to size).

The patterns on all of our scapulars have been influenced by American quilts from the deep south, as well as east coast scrimshaw artifacts. Texts are self created as well as borrowed from famous songs and scrimshaw carved phrases that would have been created by love-sick sailors. 

Text to choose from for this triangles image:

Option 1: 
IN THE END THE LOVE YOU TAKE IS EQUAL TO THE LOVE YOU MAKE

Option 2: 
OH GIVE NOT WAY TO SORROW, HOPE FOR THE BEST DAWN BRINGS TOMORROW

options.name: IN THE END THE LOVE YOU TAKE
OH GIVE NOT WAY TO SORROW

name: Solid Sterling Silver Hammered Band Pendant-Franny and Zooey
description:
These were created as part of our 'memory' series which plays with  ways to hold onto memory and keep loved ones close.The form used for these hammered silver bands was inspired from bird bands used in the act of migratory bird banding/mapping. Each band is inscribed with text.

This specific style includes 2 pieces, and is impressed with text from the Franny section from J.D. Salinger’s  Franny and Zooey. Other band styles are inscribed with different texts from music and literature.

 The phrase inscribed was chosen from the heroine, Franny's, near obsession with a custom she learns of while reading "The way of the Pilgrim". Her fascination is with the Pilgrim's belief that if one repeats a prayer enough times it will become synchronized with the beat of one's own heart so one will pray forever without ceasing. Franny points out that the word 'mercy' is a particularly poignant word for this custom, as it can mean so many things. She also makes reference to the similar Buddhist custom of repeating "Namu Amida Butsu", and the practice of the verbal meditation 'Om'.

The inscription hammered into this piece is the last sentence from Franny's section of Franny and Zooey, and reads:

"HER LIPS BEGAN TO MOVE, FORMING SOUNDLESS WORDS, AND THEY CONTINUE TO MOVE".

Inside this band, rests a smaller band inscribed with the word "MERCY" repeated around the entire band.

The larger band is approximately 1" wide x 5/8" in diameter.
The smaller band is approximately 3/4" wide x 3/8" in diameter.

Both bands hang on the same 30" sterling silver chain that would hang approximately above one's heart.

(designed 2010)

name: Solid Sterling Silver Hammered Band Pendant-"To Live..."
description:
These were created as part of our 'memory' series which plays with ways to hold onto memory and keep loved ones close.  The form is inspired from the act of migratory bird banding. Each band is hammered and inscribed with text.

This specific style reads:
“TO LIVE IN THE HEARTS OF THOSE LEFT BEHIND IS TO LIVE FOREVER”

Others band styles include lyrics from well known songs and literature.

The band is approximately 1" wide x 5/8" in diameter.

Band hangs on a 30" sterling silver chain.
photo credit Jennilee Marigomen, Pig Magazine, Issue 19
(designed 2010)

name: Reversible Tassel Pendant
description: Tassels hang on a crocheted oxidized sterling silver chain. Either tassel can be worn as the center front pendant. Chain is 30" (+tassels).

name: Hand-Woven God's Eye Pendant-Solid
description:
These God's Eye pendants are part of our dark arts series paying homage to woodsy-craft and folklore. Each pendant is cut from stainless steel (for strength), and hand-woven with nylon cord. Pendants are available in solid or striped versions, and custom color combinations are available by request.

The God's Eye pendant measures 1 7/8" x 1 3/4" and comes on a 30" sterling silver chain.

Although it is very strong, this piece is hand woven and is delicate in nature,  it is not recommended that it be worn in the shower or while swimming.

(designed 2006)

name: Hand-Woven God's Eye Pendant-Striped
description:
These God's Eye pendants are part of our dark arts series paying homage to woodsy-craft and folklore. Each pendant is cut from stainless steel (for strength), and hand-woven with nylon cord. Pendants are available in solid or striped versions, and custom color combinations are available by request.

The God's Eye pendant measures 1 7/8" x 1 3/4" and comes on a 30" sterling silver chain.

Although it is very strong, this piece is hand woven and is delicate in nature,  it is not recommended that it be worn in the shower or while swimming.

(designed 2006)

options.name: God's Eye Red, White and Black

name: Sterling Silver Tongue Tied Cherry Stem
description:
Cherry stems tied in knots by tricky tongues in the 1960’s style transform into flirtatious mementos. 

By finding hidden strengths in otherwise disposable items, previously disregarded objects provide wearable narratives.  Nostalgic items become ‘fossilized’ creating new ways to hold onto memories.

Because an individual cherry stem is used for each silver piece, every pendant is has slight differences making every piece unique. Cherry stem measures approximately 5/8" long. Pendent hangs on a 24" sterling silver cable chain.

name: Solid Sterling Silver Wishbone Pendant
description:
By finding hidden strengths and beauty in otherwise disposable items, previously disregarded objects become fossilized in silver, allowing them to take on new lives as playful metaphors and precious objects.

This wishbone pendant was molded from a pheasant bone that my family responsibly hunted, consumed, enjoyed, and was grateful for. (You can see the original wishbone in our posted process photograph).

Wishbone pendant measures approximately 2" long. Hangs on a 24" sterling silver simple cable chain. 

(Yes,this is the very wishbone pendant worn by Marti in Hellcats. Let us know in your paypal order under 'note to merchant' and we can make sure you have it on the same chain that she wears).

(designed 2005)

name: Engraved Thimble Pendant
description:
Cast in bronze, this thimble has been hand engraved with the phrase 
I THINK OF YOU
Finish is antiqued bronze.

Note: A small number 6 is also present on the back of this thimble as it was a part of the original thimble that was used to make this piece.

Thimble is also available with a horse hair tassel embedded in the cavity of the thimble.

Comes on a 24" sterling silver chain.

name: Japanese Glass Beaded Bracelet
description:
Made with fine precision cut Japanese glass beads and finished with sterling silver trims. Each beaded bracelet is able to adjust in size by using one of it's own beads as a cinch. An engraved sterling silver tab adorns each bracelet and sterling silver crimps finish each the end of  the main cord. 

Bracelets expand to approximately  8.25" to fit over the hand and are able to cinch down to approximately 5.5" to be worn on the wrist.

Although it is very strong, this piece is hand woven and is delicate in nature, it is not recommended that it be worn in the shower or while swimming.

(designed 2010)

options.name: Black with pastel and lime sections
Red with black, white, and light blue

name: Japanese Glass Beaded Necklace
description:
Made with fine precision cut Japanese glass beads and finished with sterling silver trims. Each beaded necklace is able to adjust in size by using one of it's own beads as a cinch. An engraved sterling silver tab adorns each necklace and sterling silver crimps finish each the end of  the main cord. 

Necklaces are expand to approximately  27" to fit over the wearer's head and are able to cinch down to approximately 22" to be worn shorter. These necklaces are intended to be worn as a single strand, and do not double loop around the neck.

Although it is very strong, this piece is hand woven and is delicate in nature,  it is not recommended that it be worn in the shower or while swimming.

(designed 2010)

Black with primary red, blue,   yellow

name: Hand-Stitched + Beaded Wrap-Around Leather Bracelet
description:
This hand-stitched wrap around leather bracelet has fine precision cut Japanese glass beads woven into the stitching. Clasps are silver plated. Bracelet wraps around the wrist twice.

Available in brown or black leather.

Bracelet measures approximately 5/16" wide x 13 7/8" long.

(designed 2010)

name: Sterling Silver Crystal Shaped Pendant-Narrow
description:
Solid sterling silver pendant, shaped like a sleek, traditional hexagram cut, crystal prism.

Hangs on a  24" long sterling silver basic cable chain.

A shorter, wider, hexagram cut version of this pendant is also available.(designed 2006)

name: Solid Sterling Silver Crystal Shaped Pendant-Wide
description:
Solid sterling silver pendant, shaped like a sleek, traditional hexagram cut, crystal prism.

Hangs on a  30" long sterling silver chain.

A longer, narrow, hexagram cut version of this pendant is also available.

(designed 2006)

name: Solid Sterling Silver Raven Talon
description:
By finding hidden strengths and beauty in otherwise disposable items, previously disregarded objects become fossilized in silver, allowing them to take on new lives as playful metaphors and precious objects.

This sterling silver 2 piece pendant was molded from a raven talon that originally belonged to a shaman. 

Talon pendant is approximately 2" long. Hangs on a 30" sterling silver chain as shown in picture.

(designed 2005)

name: Solid Sterling Silver Seahorse
description:
By finding hidden strengths and beauty in otherwise disposable items, previously disregarded objects become fossilized in silver, allowing them to take on new lives as playful metaphors and precious objects.

The original Seahorse that this pendant was molded from was found in the medicinal jars at the Chinatown herbalist.

Seahorse measures approximately 2.24" long. Hangs on a 30" sterling silver chain as shown.

(designed 2004)

name: Solid Sterling Silver Cocktail Sword Pendant
description:
An organic casting method allowed for the iconic cocktail sword to be transformed into a wearable talisman/totem. Utilizing this  type of casting method  means that each individual silver sword was once a plastic cocktail sword. By finding hidden strengths and beauty in otherwise disposable items, previously disregarded objects become fossilized in silver, allowing them to take on new lives as playful metaphors and precious objects. 

When worn as a pendent the sword can also be 'pierced' through a chunky sweater or gauzy scarf similar to searing it like a pin, however, it is recommended when worn this way to keep the sword on a chain around your neck as well, to ensure you don't lose it! Be cautious- this fierce little pendent is sharp too! If you find it too sharp, you can make the tip more dull by pulling it a few times across some rough sandpaper or a metal nail file.

Sword pendant is approximately 3" long. Hangs on a 30" sterling silver chain as shown in picture.

(designed 2003)

name: Sterling Silver Miniature Diamond Ring
description:
A miniature diamond ring (the stone is cubic zirconium) makes for a perfect stand-in while waiting for the real thing. 

Each ring comes on a 22" sterling silver chain. Ring is approximately 3/8" in diameter.

(designed 2004)

options.name: Sterling Silver mini ring with cubic zirconium

name: Horse Hair Tassel Thimble Pendant
description:
Cast in bronze, this thimble pendant has been hand engraved with the phrase 
I THINK OF YOU
Finish is antiqued bronze.

A horse hair tassel embedded in the cavity of the thimble. This pendant is also available without the horse hair tassel.

Note: A small number 6 is also present on the back of this thimble as it was a part of the original thimble that was used to make this piece.

name: Handmade Shearling Moccasins
description:
These hand-made shearling sheepskin moccasin booties are made from the softest New Zealand shearling. The booties are stitched together with waxed cotton lacing. 

The fibers of shearling wick away moisture or retain moisture, depending on humidity, and thus a garment or item of footwear made from them tends to be comfortable year round.

Both our moccasin styles feature beading on the laces on the center back of the boot, and come in a cotton muslin duster bag with a beaded drawcord.

We also have elk leather moccasins available as a separate product within our online store.

Moccasins are available in three sizes: 0-3 months and 3-6 months. We have a sizing chart posted on our sizing page to help you select the correct size. Colors vary with the seasons and the availability of the hides.

Because of their precious miniature character we often see people purchase these for their young ones to hold onto well after they have outgrown them, as a keepsake from their 'tiny time'.  We even have people buy them for themselves (not for a child) simply to put them on display in their homes!

name: Handmade Elk Leather Moccasins
description:
Hand-made leather moccasin booties are made from Canadian Elk skin and are stitched together with waxed cotton. The booties feature hand-painted and hand-embroidered embellishments.

Moccasins are available in three sizes: 0-6 months and6-18 months. We have a sizing chart posted on our sizing page to help you select the correct size. Colors vary with the seasons and the availability of the hides. 

Style features beading on the laces on the center back of the boot, and come in a cotton muslin duster bag (as shown in picture).

Because of their precious miniature character we often see people purchase these for their young ones to hold onto well after they have outgrown them, as a keepsake from their 'tiny time'.  We even have people buy them for themselves (not for a child) simply to put them on display in their homes!

name: Hand-painted Lil' Edie Ginger Family Wooden Mobile
description:
With a strong Scandinavian design influence, five happy faces hang from a small wooden dowel. 
Each face is approximately 2" in diameter.
Each mobile is hand-painted (variations do exist), making each mobile unique.

This mobile is available in 'Ginger Family' (all red heads as shown here) or 'Multi-Cultural Family' (shown on our online store as a separate product) .

Cord for hanging is approximately 2 yards long and should accommodate high ceilings. 

For longer cord requests please include it while paying under 'notes to merchant' on your Paypal order.

name: Hand-painted Lil' Edie Multi-Cultural Family Wooden Mobile
description:
With a strong Scandinavian style influence, five happy faces hang from a wooden dowel.
Each face is approximately 2" in diameter.
Each mobile is hand painted (variations exist), making each mobile unique.

This mobile is available in 'Multi-Cultural Family' or  'Ginger Family' (all red heads, that are also listed  on our online store as a separate product) .

Cord for hanging is approximately 2 yards long and should accommodate high ceilings. 

For longer cord requests please include it while paying under 'notes to merchant' on your Paypal order.

name: 'Read-To-Me' Tee-Pee
description:
Inspired by our favorite memories of fort making, and our earliest experiences of defining our own space, we made this self standing tee-pee. Great for an impromptu pow-wow or club house meeting, or to just quietly enjoy a book together.

Our Little Edie 'Read-To-Me' tee-pee® is made from 100% light weight unbleached cotton, and comes with custom cut iron-on synthetic felt decals to decorate your tee-pee cover in your own way. Iron-on decal shapes and colors are as per image in photo. Because it is light-weight cotton canvas, the tee-pee cover can also be painted, much like canvas. The cotton tee-pee cover comes with horizontal decorative zig-zag ribbons already sewn on (as shown in photo), but is other wise a blank canvas for how you would like it to look.

Perfect for weddings and outdoor parties, patio sun-shades, portable/impromptu hotel room fort, private space in a small apartment.

Recommended washing is hand wash, hang to dry.

The tee-pee stands approximately 6' high x 5' wide at the base.

The tee-pee disassembles to fit in a 3' x 8" x 8" box. 

Blank tee-pees are available.

Intellectual property and design Becky Brisco 2010

name: Milk Tooth Keeper
description:
Just before I first moved away from home I was snooping in my father’s bedroom. In his dresser I found an antique ink well. When I opened it, there was a small glass vial inside, and when I pulled that out I was surprised to find all of my baby teeth that my parents had kept. I still have this special treasure and will always remember the joy and wonder I felt when I first discovered it.

This keeper was inspired by that antique ink well so that others may one day have a similar experience and keep sake.

 A vessel made of bronze houses a removable  glass bottle.  The interior glass bottle is screened with a place to write a meaningful word, date, or name. 

Some ideas for treasures one may keep: baby teeth, locks of hair, precious notes, affirmations, a beloved pet’s whiskers, sand or dirt from adored places, or anything else that you want to keep safe and close.

This is a great memento to start off a new little person’s life, that they can take with them when they are all grown up. It works great as a mini time capsule too. You can create your own heirloom!

Available in silver by special order.

name: Edie's Bath Time Fun Kit
description:
Each kit includes an all natural sea sponge-on-a-rope (each with a primary colored block-bead), and a rubber ducky shaped soap.

Rubber ducky soaps are made with pure shea butter.

Soaps are available in three scents; unscented; the gentle scents of organic lavender oil; or a  blend of sweet orange with vanilla and almond oils.

Rubber ducky soap measures approximately 2" x 2" .
Please note the wooden block on sponge rope varies in primary color. (color of block may be red, yellow, green, blue, or purple).

About Shea Butter
The application of Shea Butter has shown to help with wrinkles, burns, sores, scars, stretch marks, eczema, blemishes, rashes, dermatitis, psoriasis, dandruff, and other skin disorders.Shea butter can also help soothe sunburned skin and insect bites. It may also help diminish wrinkles by moisturizing the skin, promoting cell renewal, and increasing circulation. Shea butter also contains cinnamic acid, a substance that helps protect the skin from harmful UV rays.

options.name: Bath Time Fun Kit: unscencted soap
Bath Time Fun Kit: organic lavender scent
Bath Time Fun Kit: organic sweetorange/vanilla/almond blend

name: Handmade Leather Moleskine Journal Cover
description:
This journal cover is made from luxurious, sturdy, Italian leather. Cover fits over any Moleskine pocket sized note book, journal, or day planner (sized 3.5" x 5.5"). The journal cover fastens with a wrap-around leather cord. A pen can slide through a loop created on the outer front cover that is part of the wrap-around cord.

Each leather cover comes with one blank Moleskine notebook inside. 

The Black covers feature 2 plain small studs on the spine. 

The Brown versions feature beads on the fastening cord which can easily be added to or removed.
